data.name: Hunter Project: Operation Survive
data.detailed_description:
Storyline

In the year 3035, an Alien empire invaded Earth after Earth had a conflict between two governments. Humanity retreated to a planet called Typhon as a way to escape the Alien's wrath. The Aliens, after the invasion, unknowingly dropped parasites of unknown origin onto Earth, causing the parasite to begin reproducing and expanding. The human government began to study the parasite and its behavior by creating a dedicated research facility named the "Pandora's Box." After a few years of the research facility's creation, the facility had gotten overrun by the infection and was abandoned. The military formed a special military branch called the Cleaners. Assigned to do tasks on Earth such as recovering data, studying parasite behaviors, finding survivors, etc. Cleaner 1.5.9. was one of the first to go down to Earth and as they dropped with their squad, they were wiped out by the infection. Cleaner 1.5.9. survived, but now they have abandoned them and have to survive independently. Survive!

Hunter Project: Operation Survive is a top-down action shooter that puts you in the shoes of an agent tasked to go to Earth and make a dent in the infestation called the "Hive". Your team is dead and you are now alone, abandoned by command.

Key Features

  • Story
    Play in an action story of a soldier trying to survive on their own with no support and a horde of zombies ready to kill.
  • Survival
    The enemies keep coming until you die. The Hive spawns will come from different directions and your gun only shoots at one. Survive... if you can.
  • Expeditions
    Go with a team in a vast and open field, complete tasks while fighting a rogue organization and the infection while encountering survivors.
  • Watch your health!
    The Hive will constantly attack you and you must keep an eye on your vitals.
  • Unique maps
    Go from science labs to cities, and play through big open areas to either survive or explore.
  • interact with survivors on Earth
    Find and meet survivors on Earth, with your uniform, they will either help you... or fight you.
  • Weapons of choice
    Use different weapons to fight the horde of zombies and hope you don't run out of ammo.

data.short_description: Hunter Project: Operation Survive is a basic top-down shooter with the goal of survival. You are a member of an elite unit called the Cleaners. Tasked to go to Earth and make a dent in an unknown virus. You must also complete other tasks given to you by the command. Survival is optional.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7
  • Processor: 1GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1600x900
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 10
  • Processor: 3GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920x1080 (full HD 1080p)

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This game contains strong language, extreme violence, and mature themes and contents
